title: Want to buy T215 Red Cross
author: Sean

posts.post_title: Want to buy T215 Red Cross
posts.post_content: I'm looking to buy the following T215s: Gabby Street, Roger Bresnahan, and Fred Merkle (type-1 or type-2 in the case of Merkle).
wouldn't happen to have a Barney Pelty to sell/trade?? Thanks, Michael.
